marytts.util.dom

Class MaryDomUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.util.dom.DomUtils
      • marytts.util.dom.MaryDomUtils

  • public class MaryDomUtils
extends DomUtils
    A collection of utilities for MaryXML DOM manipulation or analysis. No object of class MaryDomUtils is created, all methods are static.
    Author:
    Marc Schröder

        public MaryDomUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • encloseWithMTU

        public static Element encloseWithMTU(Element t,
                     String orig,
                     String accentPosition)
        Create a new <mtu> element, inserted in the tree at the position of t and enclosing t.
        Parameters:
        t - the <t> element to enclose
        orig - the original text for the MTU, saved in the orig attribute
        accentPosition - optionally, specify an accent position, saved in the accent attribute of the mtu element. If null, no accent attribute is inserted.
        Returns:
        the newly created MTU element.

      • appendToken

        public static Element appendToken(Element t,
                  String newTokenText)
        Create a new <t> element and insert it after t.
        Parameters:
        t - t
        newTokenText - newTokenText
        Returns:
        the new <t> element.

      • tokenText

        public static String tokenText(Element t)
        Convenience method returning the text string of a token element.
        Parameters:
        t - t
        Returns:
        getPlainTextBelow(t).trim()

      • setTokenText

        public static void setTokenText(Element t,
                String s)
        Convenience method for setting the text string of a token element.
        Parameters:
        t - t
        s - s

      • createBoundary

        public static Element createBoundary(Document doc)
        Create a default boundary element belonging to document doc, but not yet attached. The boundary has a breakindex of 3 and an unknown tone.
        Parameters:
        doc - the maryxml document in which to create the boundary.
        Returns:
        boundary

      • getLocale

        public static Locale getLocale(Document doc)
        Try to determine the locale of a document by looking at the xml:lang attribute of the document element.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document in which to look for a locale.
        Returns:
        the locale set for the document, or null if no locale is set.

      • isSchemaValid

        public static boolean isSchemaValid(Document doc)
                             throws MaryConfigurationException
        Verify whether a given document is valid in the sense of Schema XML validation. Note that this implementation will merely return false if the document is not valid, but will not provide any details. Use a combination of document2String() and parseDocument() to get the detailed error message.
        Parameters:
        doc - The document to verify.
        Returns:
        true if the document is Schema valid, false if not.
        Throws:
        MaryConfigurationException - if the validation cannot be carried out
